text: 10.41: 1 Kin 17.10; 2 Kin 4.8Guma the maaŋ muuŋgip kha ndɨkndɨgar muunga, ‘Gu Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma then kurkurarga.’ Ana maaŋ suaŋgip, Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ guma the ndigip, wo phenan ŋgɨgɨp, ana ganɨv, tɨvar vhuun ana muuŋgirga, Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma ndi bigir vhuuiŋ, ana mba khesharigi bigir vhuuiŋra ana nɨɨŋgirga. Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the khueŋ ndɨkndɨgɨrga, ‘Gu tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui guma the ndigip, wo phenan ŋgɨgɨp, ana ganɨv, tɨvir vhuuin ana muunga.’ Ana maaŋ suaŋgip, ana mba tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui guma ndiga wo phenan tɨgap, ana garav, tɨvar vhuun ana mbui. Mba guma, ana mba tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi ndi bigir vhuuiŋ, ana mba khesharigi bigir vhuuiŋra ndirga.
